All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
CelestialObject
This abstract class forms the basis of each celestial body that will appear in the solar system simulation.
Driver
Creates a BaseConverterGUI instance, which contains a demonstration of SolarSystemPanel
Moon
A Moon object is one that orbits around a host Planet in 2D space.
Planet
Derived from CelestialObject, a Planet has the added capability of having an orbit and a velocity.
SolarSystemPanel
This JPanel-derived class contains the implementation of a solar system simulation.
Star
A subclass of CelestialObject, a Star is simply a circular object in 2D space which remains still.
BaseConverterGUI
This class contains the GUI window that will house the Solar System JPanel.
